trans-unit.source: Stateful Reliable Service Diagnostics
trans-unit.target: Stateful Reliable Service Diagnostics

trans-unit.source: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services
trans-unit.target: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services

trans-unit.source: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services
trans-unit.target: Diagnostic Functionality for Stateful Reliable Services

trans-unit.source: The Stateful Reliable Services StatefulServiceBase class emits [EventSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.diagnostics.tracing.eventsource.aspx) events
trans-unit.target: The Stateful Reliable Services StatefulServiceBase class emits [EventSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.diagnostics.tracing.eventsource.aspx) events

trans-unit.source: that can be used for debugging the service, provide insights into how the runtime is operating and help with troubleshooting.
trans-unit.target: that can be used for debugging the service, provide insights into how the runtime is operating and help with troubleshooting.

trans-unit.source: EventSource events
trans-unit.target: EventSource events

trans-unit.source: The EventSource name for Stateful Reliable Service StatefulServiceBase class is "Microsoft-ServiceFabric-Services".
trans-unit.target: The EventSource name for Stateful Reliable Service StatefulServiceBase class is "Microsoft-ServiceFabric-Services".

trans-unit.source: Events from this event source appear in the
trans-unit.target: Events from this event source appear in the

trans-unit.source: [Diagnostics Events](service-fabric-diagnostics-how-to-monitor-and-diagnose-services-locally.md#view-service-fabric-system-events-in-visual-studio) window when the service
trans-unit.target: [Diagnostics Events](service-fabric-diagnostics-how-to-monitor-and-diagnose-services-locally.md#view-service-fabric-system-events-in-visual-studio) window when the service

trans-unit.source: is being [debugged in Visual Studio](service-fabric-debugging-your-application.md).
trans-unit.target: is being [debugged in Visual Studio](service-fabric-debugging-your-application.md).

trans-unit.source: Service Fabric also offers the option of directing these events to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/).
trans-unit.target: Service Fabric also offers the option of directing these events to [Application Insights](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/application-insights/).

trans-unit.source: For more information on this, please see
trans-unit.target: For more information on this, please see

trans-unit.source: the article on [Application Insights setup for Service Fabric](service-fabric-diagnostics-application-insights-setup.md).
trans-unit.target: the article on [Application Insights setup for Service Fabric](service-fabric-diagnostics-application-insights-setup.md).

trans-unit.source: Other examples of tools and technologies that help in collecting and/or viewing EventSource events are [PerfView](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=28567),
trans-unit.target: Other examples of tools and technologies that help in collecting and/or viewing EventSource events are [PerfView](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=28567),

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft Azure Diagnostics](../cloud-services-dotnet-diagnostics.md) and the
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft Azure Diagnostics](../cloud-services-dotnet-diagnostics.md) and the

trans-unit.source: [Microsoft TraceEvent Library](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.TraceEvent).
trans-unit.target: [Microsoft TraceEvent Library](http://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.TraceEvent).

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: Events

trans-unit.target: Event Name

trans-unit.target: Event Id

trans-unit.source: Level
trans-unit.target: Level

trans-unit.source: Event Description
trans-unit.target: Event Description

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is started
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is started

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncCancellation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncCancellation

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is cancelled
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is cancelled

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncCompletion
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncCompletion

trans-unit.source: Informational
trans-unit.target: Informational

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task is completed
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task is completed

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: Warning

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task takes too long to complete cancellation
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task takes too long to complete cancellation

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncFailure
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncFailure

trans-unit.source: Error
trans-unit.target: Error

trans-unit.source: Emitted when service RunAsync task throws an exception
trans-unit.target: Emitted when service RunAsync task throws an exception

trans-unit.source: Interpreting Events
trans-unit.target: Interpreting Events

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation, StatefulRunAsyncCompletion and StatefulRunAsyncCancellation events are useful to the service writer to understand the lifecycle of a service as well as the timing for when a
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncInvocation, StatefulRunAsyncCompletion and StatefulRunAsyncCancellation events are useful to the service writer to understand the lifecycle of a service as well as the timing for when a

trans-unit.source: service is started, cancelled and completed.
trans-unit.target: service is started, cancelled and completed.

trans-unit.source: This can be useful when debugging service issues or understanding the service lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: This can be useful when debugging service issues or understanding the service lifecycle.

trans-unit.source: Service writers should pay close attention
trans-unit.target: Service writers should pay close attention

trans-unit.source: to StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation and StatefulRunAsyncFailure events as they indicate issues with the service.
trans-unit.target: to StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation and StatefulRunAsyncFailure events as they indicate issues with the service.

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncFailure is emitted whenever
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncFailure is emitted whenever

trans-unit.source: the service RunAsync() task throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: the service RunAsync() task throws an exception.

trans-unit.source: Typically an exception thrown indicates an error or bug in the service.
trans-unit.target: Typically an exception thrown indicates an error or bug in the service.

trans-unit.source: Additionally the exception causes the service to fail and thus moved to a
trans-unit.target: Additionally the exception causes the service to fail and thus moved to a

trans-unit.source: different node which can be an expensive operation and delay incoming requests while the service is moved.
trans-unit.target: different node which can be an expensive operation and delay incoming requests while the service is moved.

trans-unit.source: Service writers should determine the cause of the exception and if possible mitigate it.
trans-unit.target: Service writers should determine the cause of the exception and if possible mitigate it.

trans-unit.source: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation is emitted whenever a cancellation request for the RunAsync task takes longer than 4 seconds.
trans-unit.target: StatefulRunAsyncSlowCancellation is emitted whenever a cancellation request for the RunAsync task takes longer than 4 seconds.

trans-unit.source: When a service takes too long to complete cancellation, it impacts
trans-unit.target: When a service takes too long to complete cancellation, it impacts

trans-unit.source: the ability for the service to be quickly restarted on another node and may impact overall availability of the service.
trans-unit.target: the ability for the service to be quickly restarted on another node and may impact overall availability of the service.
